AUTH_HOME.TITLE: Login
AUTH_HOME.CTA: We're glad to have you back and we're ready to meet your needs. Log in and continue to get the most out of our platform.
AUTH_HOME.MONITOR_FEATURE: Optimize productivity across all your projects with a single tool
AUTH_HOME.ORGANIZED_FEATURE: Administrators can have an overview of all tasks and their distribution over time.

LOGIN_FORM.EMAIL_ERROR: Required. Must be a valida mail
LOGIN_FORM.PASSWORD_ERROR: Required. Must be at least 8 characters include a letter and number

REGISTER_FORM.NAME: Name
REGISTER_FORM.LAST_NAME_ERROR: Required. Not a valid last name
REGISTER_FORM.PASSWORD_ERROR: Required. Must be at least 8 chars, include a letter and number.

TASK_MODAL.TITLE: Task Creation
TASK_MODAL.TITLE_ERROR: Required. Must be a valid description.

USER_MODAL.TITLE: Create User
USER_MODAL.NAME: Name
USER_MODAL.ERROR_PASSWORD: Required. Must be at least 8 chars include a letter and number

USAR_MODAL.NAME_ERROR: Required. Must be a valid user name.
USAR_MODAL.LASTNAME_ERROR: Required. Must be a valid user lastname.
USAR_MODAL.EMAIL_ERROR: Required. Must be a valid user email.
